ygData.subject: Re: Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)
ygData.msgSnippet: They have recently fixed LORE items with the last update, i believe that you may only have one lore item in your possesion at a time... the skull is a lore
ygData.messageBody:
They have recently fixed LORE items with the last update, i believe that you
may only have one lore item in your possesion at a time... the skull is a
lore item
----- Original Message -----
From: Spehar, David J <David.Spehar@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 9:43 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)


> From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
>
> Actually I meant the necklaces have a quest that originates in gtr faydark
> (kelethin actually).
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Steve Bohne - Sun Microsystems

> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)

> Fluke
